column4: can anyone suggest some good online resource to learn terminal commands and other useful things for ubuntu?
there are classic guides to bash, the default shell, but they are old and possibly misleading

I am new to ubuntu and want to learn as i have heard its a far more flexible and powerful OS than windows, so pls suggest some guide or website which gives step by step lessons ; I have tried ubuntu forems but they are too complex
check out the link that xangua posted
